original_text: Wherefore she went forth out of the place where she was, and her two daughters in law with her; and they went on the way to return unto the land of Judah.
korean_text: 있던 곳에서 나오고 두 며느리도 그와 함께 하여 유다 땅으로 돌아오려고 길을 가다가

sentences.original_text: Wherefore she went forth out of the place
and her two daughters in law with her
and they went on the way
to return unto the land of Judah
